channel.title: SMF 79 Subtype 9 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 79 Subtype 9 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - alias_number_change
item.description: =1 If number of alias exposures changed Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79ASL

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79ASN

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79ASS

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cmb_data_invalid
item.description: =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - command_response_time
item.description: =1 Initial command response time available Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79DAT

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - data_invalid
item.description: DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DCL

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DCN

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DCS

item.title: Field - device_data_incomplete
item.description: Incomplete device data due to too many devices Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - device_ficon
item.description: Device connected to FICON Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cn2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cn2.

item.title: Field - device_time_invalid
item.description: =1 IF DEVICE CONNECT OR PENDING OR DISCONNECT TIME IS INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - ecmb_mode
item.description: =1 ECMB mode Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control 3 Interval was under SMF control lower_service_level 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. higher_service_level 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79GIE

item.title: Field - goal_mode
item.description: System is in GOAL mode Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - higher_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - hyperpav_base_device
item.description: =1 HyperPAV base device Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IET

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79INT

item.title: Field - interrupt_delay_time
item.description: =1 Interrupt delay time available Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - interval_smf_control
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - invalid_data
item.description: inval. Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - invalid_samples
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79LGO

item.title: Field - lower_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mcl
item.description: LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79MCL

item.title: Field - mcn
item.description: NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79MCN

item.title: Field - mcs
item.description: OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79MCS

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MFV

item.title: Field - model_data_inavaliable_stsch
item.description: =1 model dependent data not available by STSCH Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - mounted_volume_sn
item.description: VOLUME SERIAL NUMBER OF MOUNTED VOLUME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799SER

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MVS

item.title: Field - no_lcud_info
item.description: =1 IF NO LCUD INFORMATION Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79OIL

item.title: Field - online_interval_end
item.description: =1 FOR ONLINE AT END OF INTERVAL Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - parallel_access_vol
item.description: =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zaap_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79PRN

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PTN

item.title: Field - qlength_invalid
item.description: =1 IF IOS Q-LENGTH INVALID Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r799cnf.

item.title: Field - qsl
item.description: LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79QSL

item.title: Field - qsn
item.description: NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79QSN

item.title: Field - qss
item.description: OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79QSS

item.title: Field - r799alc
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS ALLOCATED Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799ALC

item.title: Field - r799atv
item.description: FUNCTION ACTIV TIME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799ATV

item.title: Field - r799cmr
item.description: Command response time in units of 128 microseconds Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CMR

item.title: Field - r799cn2
item.description: Device flag extension 2 Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CN2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description device_ficon 0 Device connected to FICON

item.title: Field - r799cnf
item.description: DEVICE FLAGS Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CNF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qlength_invalid 0 =1 IF IOS Q-LENGTH INVALID no_lcud_info 1 =1 IF NO LCUD INFORMATION cmb_data_invalid 2 =1 IF CMB DATA INVALID device_time_invalid 3 =1 IF DEVICE CONNECT OR PENDING OR DISCONNECT TIME IS INVALID data_invalid 6 DATA INVALID, VARIED ON OR OFF, OR DYNAMIC RECONFIGURATION online_interval_end 7 =1 FOR ONLINE AT END OF INTERVAL

item.title: Field - r799cnn
item.description: DEVICE CONNECT TIME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CNN

item.title: Field - r799cnx
item.description: Device flag extension Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CNX Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description parallel_access_vol 0 =1 If base exposure of a Parallel Access Volume alias_number_change 1 =1 If number of alias exposures changed timing_inactive 2 Timing facility not active ecmb_mode 3 =1 ECMB mode model_data_inavaliable_stsch 4 =1 model dependent data not available by STSCH command_response_time 5 =1 Initial command response time available hyperpav_base_device 6 =1 HyperPAV base device interrupt_delay_time 7 =1 Interrupt delay time available

item.title: Field - r799cuq
item.description: Control Unit Queuing Time Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799CUQ

item.title: Field - r799dis
item.description: DEVICE DISCONNECT TIME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799DIS

item.title: Field - r799dvb
item.description: device busy delay time (3090,9021,9121,9221 support) Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799DVB

item.title: Field - r799idt
item.description: Interrupt delay time in units of 128 microseconds. Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799IDT Description This field is zero if not supported by the hardware.

item.title: Field - r799ios
item.description: IOS Queue time in microseconds Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799IOS

item.title: Field - r799lcu
item.description: LOGICAL CONTROL UNIT NUMBER Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799LCU

item.title: Field - r799mec
item.description: MEASUREMENT EVENT COUNT (NUMBER OF SSCH FOR WHICH CONNECT, PENDING, AND ACTIVE TIME WERE STORED Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799MEC

item.title: Field - r799nda
item.description: Total number of allocations in effect for the device Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799NDA

item.title: Field - r799nm2
item.description: Device number same as R799NUM Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799NM2

item.title: Field - r799num
item.description: DEVICE NUMBER Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799NUM

item.title: Field - r799nux
item.description: Number of exposures (if multiple). Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799NUX Description In case of a HyperPAV base device, R799HPV = 1, number of accumulated HyperPAV aliases

item.title: Field - r799pct
item.description: Number of unsuccessful PAV samples Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799PCT

item.title: Field - r799pen
item.description: FUNCTION PENDING TIME Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799PEN

item.title: Field - r799psm
item.description: Number of successful PAV samples Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799PSM

item.title: Field - r799que
item.description: NUMBER OF REQUESTS QUEUED IN IOS FOR THIS DEVICE Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799QUE

item.title: Field - r799rsv
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES DURING THE INTERVAL THAT INDICATED THAT THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799RSV

item.title: Field - r799scs
item.description: Subchannel set the device is situated Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799SCS

item.title: Field - r799ssc
item.description: START SUBCHANNEL (SSCH) COUNT Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799SSC

item.title: Field - r799typ
item.description: UNIT TYPE FROM UCBTYP FIELD Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799TYP

item.title: Field - r799utl
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES WHEN THE DEVICE WAS RESERVED, BUT AN SSCH HAD NOT BEEN ISSUED Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799UTL

item.title: Field - r79ctext
item.description: Command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTEXT

item.title: Field - r79ctxtl
item.description: Length of command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTXTL

item.title: Field - r79dtext
item.description: Default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTEXT

item.title: Field - r79dtxtl
item.description: Length default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTXTL

item.title: Field - r79gtod
item.description: Data gatherer call TOD Map: R79CHL Based on: R79GTOD

item.title: Field - r79ist
item.description: Monitor I interval start time in 0HHMMSSF format Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IST

item.title: Field - r79iwmtk
item.description: Token returned from IWMRCOLL service Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IWMTK

item.title: Field - r79lf2
item.description: Flag byte Map: R79CHL Based on: R79LF2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description relocate_section_deficient 0 Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering report_sorted_sg 1 Report sorted by SG rsm_data_invalid 2 Invalid RSM data obtained goal_mode 3 System is in GOAL mode tranx_data_invalid 4 Invalid transaction data srm_mode_changed 5 SRM mode changed invalid_data 6 inval. device_data_incomplete 7 Incomplete device data due to too many devices

item.title: Field - r79nxt
item.description: Number of data sections in following small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79NXT

item.title: Field - r79rid
item.description: Measurement name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79RID

item.title: Field - r79ses
item.description: Session name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79SES

item.title: Field - r79tot
item.description: Total number of data sections in large record Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TOT

item.title: Field - r79tsr
item.description: Total number of small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TSR

item.title: Field - r79user
item.description: User field Map: R79CHL Based on: R79USER

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAO

item.title: Field - reassembly_area
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 valid 1 broken

item.title: Field - relocate_section_deficient
item.description: Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - report_sorted_sg
item.description: Report sorted by SG Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rsm_data_invalid
item.description: Invalid RSM data obtained Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SNM

item.title: Field - sorage_group
item.description: Storage Group Name Map: R799ELEM Based on: R799SGN

item.title: Field - speed_boost
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SRL

item.title: Field - srm_mode_changed
item.description: SRM mode changed Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF79S9 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - timing_inactive
item.description: Timing facility not active Map: R799ELEM Based on: r799cnx Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r799cnx.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - tranx_data_invalid
item.description: Invalid transaction data Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF79S9 Based on: SMF79TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF79S9 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79XNM

item.title: Field - zaap_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_boost
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
